My Custom Feed

Customize Your LinkedIn
Feed for Faster Engagement.

Create custom feeds full of the people you choose,
this is the fastest, most reliable way to engage.

Customize my feed

Old Way vs New Way

Reliability Relevancy Efficiency
Default Feed ❌ Miss posts from people
you want to engage with		 ❌ Miss posts from people
you actually care about		 ❌ Waste time scrolling just
to find one good post
Bookmark profiles ❌ Too many tabs to open
and get lost between them		 ❌ Unorganized timeline &
can't spot inactive profiles		 ❌ Clicking into each profile
takes way too long
MyCustomFeed ✅ Customize your feed &
engage with who you want.		 ✅ Organized timeline &
easy to maintain it.		 ✅ Engage in one place,
engage 11x faster.

How to use MCF

1.  Create and Name Your Feed

   Create multiple custom feeds and name them.

2.  Add People to Your Feed

   Simply search and add LinkedIn profiles to your feed,
curating the content that you want to engage with.

3.  Start Engaging

   Enjoy engaging 11x faster with who you want,
all in one Feed.

4.  Update Your Feeds

   Keep your feed fresh by adding or removing profiles
as your needs change.
